newsitem.title: ESTONIA: WATER COMPANY TO ISSUE 40 MLN KROONS IN CPS.
newsitem.headline: WATER COMPANY TO ISSUE 40 MLN KROONS IN CPS.

text.p: Tallinn Water and Sewage Company will issue new commercial papers (CP) on April 29 worth 40 million kroons, Hansapank said on Thursday.
The three-month CPs will have a yield of 7.43 percent, Ulo Kallas, manager of interest rate products at Hansapank, told Reuters.
The Tallinn city government plans to sell the water company.
Tallinn Heating will also issue new CPs worth 85 million kroons on April 29 with a yield of 8.45 percent.
